column1: '''Kinships''' are long-term alliances in created by player characters in [[The Lord of the Rings Online]]. A player can create a kinship at level 15
column2: and the benefits of a kinship increase the longer it lasts
column3: and they can exist with only a single player or hundreds. Kinships are formed in order to socialize
column4: role play or group together to complete game objectives.
